hydrologistmod:CursedCabbage.NAME: Cursed Cabbage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, if you have #b
or more cards in your hand, deal #b

hydrologistmod:GliderStaff.NAME: Glider Staff
hydrologistmod:GliderStaff.FLAVOR: A relic of the ancient Air Nomads.
DESCRIPTIONS: Unused draw from hydrologistmod:Flow carries over to the next turn.

hydrologistmod:LoyalBoomerang.NAME: Loyal Boomerang
hydrologistmod:LoyalBoomerang.FLAVOR: A loyal tool from a loyal friend.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, place the top card of your discard pile onto the top of your draw pile.

hydrologistmod:MysticalPouch.NAME: Mystical Pouch
hydrologistmod:MysticalPouch.FLAVOR: It seems to have been enchanted to never run out of water.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with the last card you played last combat in your opening hand, and add an additional copy of it to your hand.

hydrologistmod:PreciousNecklace.NAME: Precious Necklace
hydrologistmod:PreciousNecklace.FLAVOR: Sometimes it just helps to keep me going.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each combat you play a #yhydrologistmod:Corporeal card, #yhydrologistmod:Flow.

hydrologistmod:SpinningStones.NAME: Spinning Stones
hydrologistmod:SpinningStones.FLAVOR: Probably the best trick I've ever seen.
DESCRIPTIONS:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
Draw 1 less card at the start of each turn.

hydrologistmod:SpiritMask.NAME: Spirit Mask
hydrologistmod:SpiritMask.FLAVOR: Sometimes a disguise is the only excuse you need to be your truest self.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies that are #yCold deal an additional #b
% less damage. Enemies that are #yHot take an additional #b

hydrologistmod:TwinBlades.NAME: Twin Blades
hydrologistmod:TwinBlades.FLAVOR: "Don't think of them as separate, because they're not."
DESCRIPTIONS: Block. Whenever you apply hydrologistmod:Heat, deal #b

hydrologistmod:WaterPouch.NAME: Water Pouch
hydrologistmod:WaterPouch.FLAVOR: I never go anywhere without it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with the last card you played last combat in your opening hand.
